author: stoddard
msg: Reintroduce the create_connection hook. This hook is required to enable
modules to completely take over all network i/o from the core.

author: trawick
msg: mod_cgid: Add retry logic for when the daemon can't fork fast
enough to keep up with new requests.  Start using
when we can't talk to the daemon.
